org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.impl.cache.util

Class ComputeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.impl.cache.util.ComputeUtils

  • public final class ComputeUtils
extends Object
    Util class that provides common methods to perform computations on top of the Ignite Compute Grid.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      Calls the specified fun function on all partitions so that is't guaranteed that partitions with the same index of all specified caches will be placed on the same node and will not be moved before computation is finished.

    • Method Detail

      • affinityCallWithRetries

        public static <R> Collection<R> affinityCallWithRetries(Ignite ignite,
                                                        Collection<String> cacheNames,
                                                        IgniteFunction<Integer,R> fun,
                                                        int retries,
                                                        int interval,
                                                        DeployingContext deployingCtx)
        Calls the specified fun function on all partitions so that is't guaranteed that partitions with the same index of all specified caches will be placed on the same node and will not be moved before computation is finished. If partitions are placed on different nodes then call will be retried, but not more than retries times with interval interval specified in milliseconds.
        Type Parameters:
        R - Type of a result.
        Parameters:
        ignite - Ignite instance.
        cacheNames - Collection of cache names.
        fun - Function to be applied on all partitions.
        retries - Number of retries for the case when one of partitions not found on the node.
        interval - Interval of retries for the case when one of partitions not found on the node.
        deployingCtx - Deploy context of user-defined classes for peer class loading.
        Returns:
        Collection of results.

      • affinityCallWithRetries

        public static <R> Collection<R> affinityCallWithRetries(Ignite ignite,
                                                        Collection<String> cacheNames,
                                                        IgniteFunction<Integer,R> fun,
                                                        int retries,
                                                        DeployingContext deployingContext)
        Calls the specified fun function on all partitions so that is't guaranteed that partitions with the same index of all specified caches will be placed on the same node and will not be moved before computation is finished. If partitions are placed on different nodes then call will be retried, but not more than retries times.
        Type Parameters:
        R - Type of a result.
        Parameters:
        ignite - Ignite instance.
        cacheNames - Collection of cache names.
        fun - Function to be applied on all partitions.
        retries - Number of retries for the case when one of partitions not found on the node.
        deployingContext - Deploy context.
        Returns:
        Collection of results.

      • getLearningEnvironment

        public static LearningEnvironment getLearningEnvironment(Ignite ignite,
                                                         UUID datasetId,
                                                         int part,
                                                         LearningEnvironmentBuilder envBuilder)
        Gets learning environment for given partition. If learning environment is not found in local node map, it will be created with specified LearningEnvironmentBuilder.
        Parameters:
        ignite - Ignite instance.
        datasetId - Dataset id.
        part - Partition index.
        envBuilder - LearningEnvironmentBuilder.
        Returns:
        Learning environment for given partition.

      • getData

        public static <K,V,C extends Serializable,D extends AutoCloseable> D getData(Ignite ignite,
                                                                             String upstreamCacheName,
                                                                             IgniteBiPredicate<K,V> filter,
                                                                             UpstreamTransformerBuilder transformerBuilder,
                                                                             String datasetCacheName,
                                                                             UUID datasetId,
                                                                             PartitionDataBuilder<K,V,C,D> partDataBuilder,
                                                                             LearningEnvironment env,
                                                                             boolean isKeepBinary)
        Extracts partition data from the local storage, if it's not found in local storage recovers this data from a partition upstream and context. Be aware that this method should be called from the node where partition is placed.
        Type Parameters:
        K - Type of a key in upstream data.
        V - Type of a value in upstream data.
        C - Type of a partition context.
        D - Type of a partition data.
        Parameters:
        ignite - Ignite instance.
        upstreamCacheName - Name of an upstream cache.
        filter - Filter for upstream data.
        transformerBuilder - Builder of upstream transformers.
        datasetCacheName - Name of a partition context cache.
        datasetId - Dataset ID.
        partDataBuilder - Partition data builder.
        env - Learning environment.
        Returns:
        Partition data.

      • removeData

        public static void removeData(Ignite ignite,
                              UUID datasetId)
        Remove data from local cache by Dataset ID.
        Parameters:
        ignite - Ignite instance.
        datasetId - Dataset ID.

      • initContext

        public static <K,V,C extends Serializable> void initContext(Ignite ignite,
                                                            String upstreamCacheName,
                                                            UpstreamTransformerBuilder transformerBuilder,
                                                            IgniteBiPredicate<K,V> filter,
                                                            String datasetCacheName,
                                                            PartitionContextBuilder<K,V,C> ctxBuilder,
                                                            LearningEnvironmentBuilder envBuilder,
                                                            int retries,
                                                            int interval,
                                                            boolean isKeepBinary,
                                                            DeployingContext deployingCtx)
        Initializes partition context by loading it from a partition upstream.
        Type Parameters:
        K - Type of a key in upstream data.
        V - Type of a value in upstream data.
        C - Type of a partition context.
        Parameters:
        ignite - Ignite instance.
        upstreamCacheName - Name of an upstream cache.
        filter - Filter for upstream data.
        transformerBuilder - Upstream transformer builder.
        ctxBuilder - Partition context builder.
        envBuilder - Environment builder.
        isKeepBinary - Support of binary objects.
        deployingCtx - Deploy context.
